General.Name: Ngern Tid Lor Public Company Limited
General.Description: Ngern Tid Lor Public Company Limited provides auto-for-cash loans to self-employed microentrepreneurs in Thailand. The company offers title loans for motorcycles, sedan-pickups, trucks, and used trucks. It also acts as a life and non-life insurance broker. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
